auth.toggleSignUp: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.toggleSignIn: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.signUpSubtitle: Create a new account to get started
auth.privacyConsent: I agree to the processing of personal data

myExercises.title: My exercises
myExercises.activeProgramsDescription: Below you'll find all your active exercise programs from completed assessments.
myExercises.endedProgramsDescription: Below you will find all programs you have already ended.

assessment.title: Pain assessment
assessment.subtitle: Fill the questionnaire to get personalized exercise recommendations

results.title: Assessment results
results.subtitle: Thank you for completing the MSK Pain Navigator
results.painAnalysis: We analyzed your answers regarding pain in {area}
results.exercisePlanDescription: Based on your assessment, we have prepared a personalized exercise program specifically designed for your condition. Please note that this program may still not be suitable for you and in no case replaces a visit to a doctor or physiotherapist. In case of any discomfort or worsening of the condition, stop exercising immediately!
results.disclaimer: This assessment does not replace professional medical help. For a complete diagnosis and treatment plan, please consult with a healthcare professional.
results.resultsSaved: âœ“ Results have been automatically saved. You can find them in the "My exercises" section.

exercisePlan.title: Your exercise plan
exercisePlan.generalDescription: Personalized program with the most important exercises from your programs. Follow the instructions and stop exercising if you feel pain.
exercisePlan.specificDescription: Exercises specific for {diagnosis} in the {area} area. Follow the instructions and stop exercising if you feel pain.
exercisePlan.whyNotGood: Why is the exercise not good?
exercisePlan.hasPain: Do you feel pain during the exercise?
exercisePlan.wantChange: Do you want to change this exercise?
exercisePlan.exercisesNotFoundDescription: For your combination of diagnosis ({diagnosis}) and pain area ({area}), we don't have specific exercises. Please consult with a physiotherapist.
exercisePlan.generalNotAvailableDescription: You don't have enough assessments to create a general program or there are no exercises with defined importance available.
exercisePlan.importantNoticeText: These exercises serve only as general recommendations and do not replace a visit to a physiotherapist or doctor. If you experience increased pain, dizziness or any discomfort during exercise, stop exercising immediately and seek professional help.
exercisePlan.exerciseChangeRequested: Exercise change request has been sent.

followUp.progressRecordedDescription: Your answers have been successfully saved
followUp.question: Question {current} of {total}
followUp.thankYou: Thank you for completing the progress questionnaire.

emptyState.noAssessments: You don't have any saved assessments yet.
